subject: Volvo Ocean Race
Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: A broken mast forced the Puma race crew and boat to a remote island, where crew members awaited assistance during the first leg of the Volvo Ocean Race, from Alicante, Spain, to Cape Town.
snippet: A broken mast forced the Puma race crew and boat to a remote island, where crew members awaited assistance during the first leg of the Volvo Ocean Race, from Alicante, Spain, to Cape Town.
